attributes.additional_details: Ban any fireworks (with a noise )on sale to the general public
attributes.background:
I Want the government to ban any fireworks that are bangers or make a noise from
Being sold to the general public for residential areas

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557780

Require 1 week's notice be given of any use of fireworks in a residential area
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332906
